text: Finsland Church () is a parish church in Kristiansand municipality in Agder county, Norway. It is located in the village of Finsland. The church is part of the Finsland parish in the Mandal deanery in the Diocese of Agder og Telemark. The white, wooden, cruciform church was built in 1808 by an unknown architect. The church seats about 250 people. This is the third church building that has stood on this site. ==See also== *List of churches in Vest- Agder ==References== Category:Churches in Kristiansand Category:Wooden churches in Norway Category:19th-century Church of Norway church buildings
title: Finsland Church
